mapper.select: SELECT region_id, t1.x, t1.y, region_name, address, pre_sale_date, t1.division_code, t2.division_name FROM view_regionInfo t1 LEFT JOIN view_divisionInfo t2 on t1.division_code = t2.division_code ORDER BY t1.pre_sale_date desc

SELECT * FROM view_regioninfo t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT #{regionId} region_id, wm_concat(sale_phone) sale_phone, min(vpi.greening_rate) greening_rate, max(vpi.avg_price) avg_price from view_projectinfo vpi where exists(select 1 from ass_regbld where region_id = '0000001' and project_id = vpi.project_id)) t2 on t1.region_id = t2.region_id left join (select #{regionId} region_id, wm_concat(distinct case when vhi.house_use like '%住宅%' then vhi.house_hold else '' end) houseHold, min(case when vhi.house_use not like '%住宅%' then 9999 else vhi.construct_area end) || '-' || max(case when vhi.house_use like '%住宅%' then vhi.construct_area else 0 end) area_range from view_houseinfo vhi where exists(select 1 from ass_regbld where region_id = '0000001' and bld_id = vhi.bld_id)) t3 on t1.region_id = t3.region_id WHERE t1.region_id = #{regionId}
